attributes.action: actively support the creation of new National Parks in Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the UK population continues to rise  the Highlands & Southern Uplands of Scotland, our last large expanse of outstanding landscape, should be protected at all costs. Several very large National Parks would afford lasting potection. Some of the parks could incorporate and unite existing reserves eg Knoydart, Assynt-Coigach, Wester Ross, Ben Nevis-Glen Coe, NW Sutherland, Kyle of Tongue, Kintail and Upper Tweedale as well as Regional and Forest Parks like Galloway, the Pentlands and Inverclyde to name but a few.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
